attributes.action: UK Government to assemble a team of voting Brexiteers to advise terms of exit.
attributes.background: 23rd June16 17.4 million people(52%) of the population voted for our complete & as immediately possible exit of the European Union(BREXIT). There was many reasons for this which affect the general public & not those of position. A team of general Brexiteers should be a part of Brexit decision making
